pyturbo.aero.airfoil3D¶

class pyturbo.aero.airfoil3D(profileArray: List[pyturbo.aero.airfoil2D.airfoil2D], profile_loc: List[float], height: float)[source]¶
__init__(profileArray: List[pyturbo.aero.airfoil2D.airfoil2D], profile_loc: List[float], height: float)[source]¶

Constructs a 3D Airfoil

Parameters

  • profileArray (List[airfoil2D]) – array of airfoil2D profiles

  • profile_loc (List[float]) – location of the airfoil2D profiles

  • height (float) – height of the 3D blade
